title: SafeRide Convertible Car Seat
description: The SafeRide Convertible Car Seat in Black provides top-notch safety and comfort for your child from infancy to toddlerhood. Designed with a 5-point harness system for infants and a convertible feature for rear-facing and forward-facing use, this car seat grows with your child. It includes a multi-position reclining seat, adjustable headrest, and advanced side-impact protection for enhanced safety during every journey. The easy-to-install base and removable, machine-washable cover add convenience for busy parents. Choose the SafeRide Convertible Car Seat for a secure and stylish travel solution.
meta_title: SafeRide Convertible Car Seat - Black | SafeBaby
meta_description: Buy the SafeRide Convertible Car Seat in Black from SafeBaby. This car seat features a 5-point harness, rear-facing and forward-facing modes, and side-impact protection. Get it now at a special offer price!
